casebody.data:
CHARLES H. SMITH, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. TIMOTHY J. COE, Defendant and Respondent.

Before Barbour, Ch. J., Freedman and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided May 31, 1873.

Action to recover a certain sum .($10,000) as liquidated .damages for the breach of covenants in a lease.

*571Charles H. Smith, appellant in pro. pers. John H. Martin, attorney,, and Ira Shafer, of counsel, for respondent.

Opinion by Barbour, Ch. J. Freedman and Sedgwick, JJ., concurred.

Appeal from a judgment for defendant, and judgment affirmed.
